subject: Simsonn Pro X pedals
description_text:
Hello I am interested in your pedal system with the Haptic kit.
I am in Australia. I presume you have no outlet here in Australia to buy directly from.
What would shipping cost me to Australia / Brisbane
The below is in USD pricing so I am assuming that AUD would be almost double this

Davod

[cid:b079c86e-76fc-4cac-b196-75056cb4a813]

conversations.body_text: Hi David Cartledge,     You can click on the link to purchase directly. The set you are viewing costs approximately AUD 835. Since the purchase amount exceeds USD 399, your order is eligible for free shipping.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-sim-pedal-pro-x-ultra?variant=51308303974714
